General.Name: M.P.Evans Group
General.Description: M.P. Evans Group PLC, through its subsidiaries, engages in the ownership, management, and development of oil palm plantations in Indonesia. The company operates through Plantation Indonesia and Property Malaysia segments. It produces crude palm oil and palm kernels. The company is also involved in the property development; and oil-palm fresh fruit bunches production businesses, as well as provision of agronomic and management consultancy services. It had interests in associated smallholder oil palm. The company was incorporated in 1981 and is headquartered in Tunbridge Wells, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 3 Clanricarde Gardens, Tunbridge Wells, United Kingdom, TN1 1HQ
